FuncDef: This is the top level of the hierarchy containing Ethernet to Legacy fault notification parameters. This context must activate using the no shutdown command before Ethernet to legacy fault notification can occur for iPipe services that make use of PPP, MLPPP or HDLC. This is only applicable to iPipe services with one legacy (PPP, MLPPP or HDLC) connection and an Ethernet SAP. No other services, not other combinations are supported.
